thread.title: Bangladesh all out for 388, no follow-on enforced
thread.title_full: Bangladesh all out for 388, no follow-on enforced

author: PTI
title: Bangladesh all out for 388, no follow-on enforced
text:
February 12, 2017 11:53   11:53 IST more-in India has taken a 300-run lead with all their second innings wickets in hand. 
India were 1 for no loss in their second innings at lunch after bowling Bangladesh out for 388 on the fourth day of the one-off cricket Test against India in Hyderabad on Sunday. 
India did not enforce a follow on and they have now taken a 300-run lead with all their second innings wickets in hand. 
Brief Scores: 
India: 687/6 dec and 1 for no loss in one over. 
Bangladesh 1st Innings: 388 all out in 127.5 overs (Shakib Al Hasan 82, Mushfiqur Rahim 127; Umesh Yadav 3/84).
